This removes a rectangular prism volume from the base, maintaining the cylindrical shape with the central hole above. Your parametric CAD model should now match the desired "final shape" description. The object is a solid, smooth cylindrical shape, with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side, and a conical hole extending through the middle of the object.</description>
